definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The curl defines an outer perimeter of the end member.
sentences.chinese: 卷边确定了端部部件的外周边。

sentences.english: The ragged hem of her under-tunic was stained with it.
sentences.chinese: 她破烂束腰内衣上的卷边沾满了血。

sentences.english: Bottom edge, with full-flavoured natural sexual freedom.
sentences.chinese: 下摆收口自然卷边，随性自由。

sentences.english: The crimp shall be generally symmetrical with minimal burrs .
sentences.chinese: 通常卷边应于最少毛边对称。

sentences.english: The hemming method most frequently utilized in the sample room is the plain hem stitch.
sentences.chinese: 样品室使用最频繁的卷边针法是包缝缘边针迹。

sentences.english: Can carry on one to make after installing the beader.
sentences.chinese: 在安装卷边器后可以进行卷边缝制。

sentences.english: Specially designed for needle to needle weaving curl.
sentences.chinese: 针对针织布卷边而特别设计。

sentences.english: We must glue the mat down at the edges to stop it curling.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须用胶把席子的边粘住，免得卷边。
